name: Lumaze
description:
This is Lumaze, a small maze that holds orbs of light. What could that light bring? I wonder... could it have anything to do with the theme of the jam?

How to Play 

  • Move the character using  WASD
  • Attack by clicking with your left mouse button
  • Strike down the June bugs as you explore Lumaze!

Developed for ZenoJam - "Light Attracts Bugs"
Note: this game is a prototype. We hope to further flesh out the game in the future, as time allows.

Credits:

  • Game Design: Judeous, Yellow,  Szybowac
  • Character Modeling: Yellow
  • Environment/Prop Modeling: Szybowac
  • Programming: Judeous
